== Install on Linux

Prerequisites:
 * Qt 4.8 development package
 * [[glutLite|https://bitbucket.org/salehqt/glutlite]]
 * QtCreator
 
==== Step 1: Install glutlite
{{{
hg clone https://bitbucket.org/salehqt/glutlite
cd glutlite
cmake .
make
sudo make install
}}}

==== Step 2: Build BezierView
Option 1: Open BezierView.pro in QtCreator and hit build

Option 2: Command line:

{{{
qmake BezierView.pro
make
}}}
